reviews.text: I was getting ready to stay at a another hotel for twice the price, but was happy with the choice I made staying here. This won't work for everyone, as there is absolutely no frill or extra, and there is no elevator. To even get to the registration desk from the street requires a walk up a staircase, and you take your own luggage. Anyone with mobility problems, look elsewhere.
reviews.title: Not for everyone, but I was happy with it.
